resources.string: A Google Sign-In is required in order to use this application.
Please Select HET Devices To Connect To
If you are reconnecting to an HET device, please be sure to restart it before connecting again
This app is designed to work with an ASSIST HET device. Press the button below to choose a device to work with.
Bluetooth is not supported on this device. We apologize, but this app cannot function without Bluetooth.
Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported on this device. We apologize, but this app cannot function without BLE.
Logo for the ASSIST research group
No devices checked. Please check at least one before continuing.
More than 2 devices selected. Please select at most 2.
